name: Haunted Home Not Alone
description:
Story

Once upon a hill, there stood a haunted manor.
A ghost family called it home.
But the parents were leaving for the night,
and it would be up to the boy to protect it.
Have fun they said! We will be back before dawn.
And so,
his watch began...

Controls
Movement -  WASD or Arrow Keys
Scare / Possess - Spacebar

Credits

A Game by Adventure Byte
